title: The Widow and the Only Man

sources.title: "The Widow And The Only Man" (1904) cinematographer Billy Bitzer

metadata.Plot: A group of women at a vacation resort see a male guest arriving, and are filled with excited anticipation. He quickly finds himself the center of attention, as several women at a time want to go riding with him or listen to him playing music. Soon, one particular widow catches his eye, so the two look for ways that they can spend time together.
